naslov: DUBROVNIK, KONAVLI LUKSUZNA VILA S BAZENOM! (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se prekrasna luksuzna vila u Močićima. Kamena vila sa velikim terasama sa svih strana, velikim ograđenim dvorištem sa bazenom i parkingom. Uz vilu se na posjedu nalazi i gostinjska kuća, također u potpunosti luksuzno renovirana i uređena. Prekrasna i unikatna nekretnina, pruža vlasniku mir i uživanje u životu u prirodi, u malom mjestu. Do Dubrovnika je potrebno 20minuta vožnje, a do aerodroma oko 5min. Dodatne informacije u Agenciji. Beautiful luxury villa for sale in Močići. Stone villa with large terraces on all sides, large fenced yard with pool and parking. In addition to the villa there is a guest house on the estate as well, also completely luxuriously renovated and decorated. Beautiful and unique property, gives the owner peace and enjoyment of life in nature, in a small place. It takes 20 minutes drive to Dubrovnik and to the airport about 5min. More information in our Agency.
